metadata.Title: CVE-2022-35019 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Advancecomp v2.3 was discovered to contain a segmentation fault.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-35019` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

advancecomp - 1.20-1ubuntu0.2+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: mdeslaur> included in commits listed in CVE-2022-35014

criterions.comment: advancecomp package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.20-1ubuntu0.2+esm2').
